## types.Slice type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Slice<Arr extends readonly any[], Start extends number = 0, End extends number = Arr['length']> = `${Start}` extends `-${string}` ? SliceRightIgnoreSign<SliceLeftIgnoreSign<Arr, Start>, End> : SliceLeftIgnoreSign<SliceRightIgnoreSign<Arr, End>, Start>;
```
